actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deadline for filing estate tax returns from 9 months to 24 months after a decedent's death.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the deadline for filing estate tax returns from 9 to 24 months following a decedent's death.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deadline for filing estate tax returns from 9 months to 24 months after a decedent's death.
